name: lemonade
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 80 HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A very sweet and refreshing drink. When consumed, it restores up to 70 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A very sweet and refreshing drink. When consumed, it restores up to 70 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A very sweet and refreshing drink. It can be used to restore 70 HP to a single Pokémon.
